name: OrganismsTestsForNucleicAcidInStool
title: Organisms (Tests for Nucleic Acid in Stool)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the Nucleic Acid of non-specific organisms in Stool.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC search: "(microorganism or pathogens) nucleic acid -panel"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel test, non-stool specimens)
